ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Wow...
ygData.msgSnippet: ... i m assuming you mean that egroups thing and paying stuff, heh. as to the verant changes , amazingly enough, i didn t notice any changes in how my bard
ygData.messageBody:
At 10:40 AM 9/11/00 -0600, you wrote:
>
>
>OMG, that really is ridiculous and unacceptable. I'd like to say
>unbelievable but...

i'm assuming you mean that egroups thing and paying stuff, heh.

as to the verant ''changes'', amazingly enough, i didn't notice any changes
in how my bard played with respect to lullaby over the last 10 months or so.
actually, my bard is much more powerful now than he was 10 moths ago. chants
allow him to solo, higher charm allows him to crowd control mobs over 39 and
solo charm kiting to 50+.

so there's no reason to quit for me, i am having as much or more fun playing my bard
as ever. did crowd control with charm in karnors last night, kept 4 mobs busy
(charmed a skeletal warlord who had 3 drolvargs beating on him) while my
group took out a couple others. unfortunately the warlord poofed when he died, but
his sacrifice was worth it, Thanks Skeletal_Warlord!!!!
